name: Rapid Key Attack
description:
RAPID KEY ATTACK is a fast pace addictive Game with beautiful artwork and music. It lets player to increase their Typing speed in a fun and obsessive way. The game is suitable for every age group.

Game basically teaches Player to memorize the layout of keyboard in a fun and unique way!Game contains 10 unique Levels , Amazing artwork , Pleasurable music , 4 Fun characters (PewdiePie , Markiplier, Minions , Superwoman) + 1 Bonus character.If you are interested and would like to get a final preview for my game please reply.

FUTURE UPDATES :

Background Music

Click Sound

Modified Levels

Bonus Character
